author: Dav
description:
Mark a user's alt accounts and get notified about them when you take a moderation action.
 Integrate this cog with alt-account identification services by hooking into the altmarker API.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing `altmarker`.
To see all available commands, use `[p]help AltMarker`.

For support with this cog, visit https://discord.gg/GET4DVk
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about you and associated accounts for moderation purposes. This includes your User ID, Username and Discriminator. By default this data is accessible to server moderators and administrators.
